urlSync.title: URL Sync Configuration
urlSync.description: Configure automatic label synchronization from a remote URL. When configured, users cannot modify these settings but can still create and manage their own labels.

enabled.title: Enable URL Sync
enabled.description: Enable or disable automatic synchronization of labels from the configured URL.

url.title: Sync URL
url.description: The URL to fetch label configuration from. Must return valid JSON with a labels array. Supports both http:// and https:// protocols.

updateFrequency.title: Update Frequency (minutes)
updateFrequency.description: How often to automatically check for label updates. Available values: 0 (disabled), 15 (every 15 minutes), 30 (every 30 minutes), 60 (hourly), 360 (every 6 hours), 1440 (daily).
